localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: 🍞 Jam is an open source implementation of audio spaces (think: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces, Orbit, …). Jam lets you can create rooms that can be used for panel discussions, jam sessions, free flowing conversations, debates, theatre plays, musicals and more.
blogPost.body: 🍞 Jam is an open source implementation of audio spaces (think: Clubhouse, Twitter Spaces, Orbit, …). Jam lets you can create rooms that can be used for panel discussions, jam sessions, free flowing conversations, debates, theatre plays, musicals and more.
blogPost.title: Jam - Your own version of Clubhouse for mini conferences & friends
blogPost.author: Thomas Schranz ⛄️

localize.description: 🍞 Jam是一个开源的音频空间实现（想想看：Clubhouse，Twitter Spaces，Orbit，...）。Jam让你可以创建可用于小组讨论、果酱会议、自由流动的对话、辩论、戏剧、音乐剧等的房间。
localize.tagline: 您自己的小型会议和朋友聚会的会所版本。

localize.description: 🍞 Jam是一個開源的音頻空間實現（想想看：Clubhouse，Twitter Spaces，Orbit，...）。Jam讓你可以創建可用於小組討論、果醬會議、自由流動的對話、辯論、戲劇、音樂劇等的房間。
localize.tagline: 您自己的小型會議和朋友聚會的會所版本。

previous.excerpt: The UI Coach anonymous feedback platform allows UI/UX designers to post their work and receive feedback and critiques from other designers from all around the world. UI Coach helps you create better designs and grow your skills by allowing you to get the feedback you need when you need it most.
previous.title: UI Feedback - Free anonymous feedback  for UI/UX designers

localize.description: UI Coach匿名反馈平台允许UI/UX设计师发布他们的作品，并从世界各地的其他设计师那里获得反馈和批评。UI Coach通过让您在最需要的时候获得您所需要的反馈，帮助您创造更好的设计并提高您的技能。
localize.tagline: 为UI/UX设计师提供免费的匿名反馈

localize.description: UI Coach匿名反饋平臺允許UI/UX設計師發佈他們的作品，並從世界各地的其他設計師那裏獲得反饋和批評。UI Coach通過讓您在最需要的時候獲得您所需要的反饋，幫助您創造更好的設計並提高您的技能。
localize.tagline: 爲UI/UX設計師提供免費的匿名反饋
